titleStmt.title: Certain observations, vpon the new league or covenant as it was explained by a divine of the new assembly, in a congregation at London / written and sent unto him in a letter by some of his auditors, with copy of the said covenant.

Certain observations, vpon the new league or covenant as it was explained by a divine of the new assembly, in a congregation at London / written and sent unto him in a letter by some of his auditors, with copy of the said covenant.
titleStmt.author: Divine of the New Assembly.

notesStmt.note: "A Solemn League and Covenant, for reformation, and defence of religion, &c.": p. 45-52.
Pages 27-32 and 40-41 have print show-through with some loss of text in filmed copy. Pages 20-45 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
